help.shortDesc: list commands or returns help about a command
help.longDesc:
help: list all commands
help commandName: help about the command with name commandName

Texts.CommandShortHelpNotFound: short help text not found for command: %1
Texts.CommandLongHelpNotFound: long help text not found for command: %1
Texts.GlobalArgHelpNotFound: help text not found for global argument: %1
